data.actual_result: The typing indicator is above the process bar making it difficult to see the progress.
data.expected_result: The typing indicator doesn't come above the upload progress bar or something.
data.short_description: The typing indicator overlaps the image upload progress bar on landscape mode. [Specific to devices with small screens].
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel where someone is typing. - Switch orientation.  - Click on the add content button and send something.
